answerText: convergence [accept word forms][10] This test for convergence takes two sequences, a sub n and b sub n, and determines the limit of the ratio of a sub n and b sub n. If the limit is a positive constant, then either both series converge or both diverge.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 1 | 13 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Every Cauchy sequence within a metric space has this property. For 10 points each: [10] Name this property which, for a series, means that the sum is finite. The harmonic series lacks this property, but the geometric series has it as long as the ratio between successive terms is between negative 1 and 1.
